name: Death Road to McGamkedonald's
description:
A combination of top-down racer, cooking/pong game. You are working on a limited fuel and you need to get to the finish line. With every acceleration, you lose fuel and only way to fill it is by cooking food through a pong game. Be careful not to cook your food for too long, it will burn! And consuming it will decrease fuel!

A team effort, by Team Gamkedo Parrots!

Charlene Andrew: Hippogriff food truck design, win/main screen, game assets, UI & icons.

Randy Tan: Idea guy, programmer (Unity prototype, not shown in game).

Vignesh Ramesh: Car movement, menu and game over music, camera follow, level change code, track friction.

Herleen Dualan: Pong/kitchen scene, pong AI/code, game art.

Nick Polchies: Frame rate optimization.

Terrence McDonnell: Track code, pong code, main game code, food counter.

Simon Hoffiz: Level design and level art.

Asix Jin: Main game music.

Cameron Button: Refrigerator idea, programmer.
